mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BSE_FRANCHISE ( ID, CODE, NAME, LOGIST_CODE, PROVINCE, PROVINCE_CODE, CITY, CITY_CODE, COUNTY, COUNTY_CODE, AREA_CODE, PHONE, FAX, ADDRESS_DETAIL, LNG, LAT, IS_SPECIFIED_TIME, IS_SHIPMENT, IS_DELIVERY, IS_PICK_UP, ACTIVE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_CODE, VERSION_NO, TAKE_SELF_DEPEND_LOGIST_CODE ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logistCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{lat,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{isSpecifiedTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isShipment,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isDelivery,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isPickUp,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{active,jdbcType=CHAR}, getdate(), 'admin', getdate(), 'admin', #{versionNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{takeSelfDependLogistCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.sql: ID, CODE, NAME, LOGIST_CODE, PROVINCE, PROVINCE_CODE, CITY, CITY_CODE, COUNTY, COUNTY_CODE, AREA_CODE, PHONE, FAX, ADDRESS_DETAIL, LNG, LAT, IS_SPECIFIED_TIME, IS_SHIPMENT, IS_DELIVERY, IS_PICK_UP, ACTIVE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_CODE, VERSION_NO, TAKE_SELF_DEPEND_LOGIST_CODE
mapper.select: SELECT isnull(max(VERSION_NO),0) as version_no FROM T_BSE_FRANCHISE
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_BSE_FRANCHISE
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIST_CODE = #{logistCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTY = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTY_CODE = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_DETAIL = #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=FLOAT},
LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=FLOAT},
IS_SPECIFIED_TIME = #{isSpecifiedTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_SHIPMENT = #{isShipment,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_DELIVERY = #{isDelivery,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_PICK_UP = #{isPickUp,jdbcType=CHAR},
ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=CHAR},
VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TAKE_SELF_DEPEND_LOGIST_CODE = #{takeSelfDependLogistCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = getdate(), MODIFY_USER_CODE = 'admin'
where CODE = #{code}
